department.ch: 人力資源管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch: The objective of this course is to familiarize students with various cross-cultural management perspectives. This course is employing a participative and case teaching method in which learning will be centered on the analysis of cases concerning the different management issues that may emerge in a cross-cultural organization. The key issues for each case should be developed through further study. Presentations, small group discussions, and case writing are used to encourage advanced learning experience.
